thread.title: Great location and customer service
thread.title_full: Great location and customer service - Review of Hotel Le Walt, Paris, France - TripAdvisor

author: thejeffpe
title: Great location and customer service
text: As a clutzy American that speaks almost no French, this place was perfect. Right around the corner from Rue Cler, a great view of the Eiffel Tower, big (for Europe) and modern room... I would give it 5 stars other than some weird quirks with the locations of their outlets (none in the bathroom), and the shower head not being properly screwed in (I fixed it pretty easily) and it sprayed water all over the counter. All part of the adventure, right?!?!
